scripts.build: npm run build-code && npm run build-bundle && copy .env dist\.env && copy .env.pass dist\.env.pass
scripts.package: rimraf distributable && mkdir distributable && patch-package && xcopy /E /I /Y node_modules distributable\node_modules && xcopy /E /I /Y dist distributable\dist && xcopy /E /I /Y assets distributable\assets && copy package.json distributable\package.json && copy start.bat distributable\start.bat && copy hide.vbs distributable\hide.vbs && (cd distributable && npm install --omit=dev --ignore-scripts && rimraf node_modules\puppeteer-core\.local-chromium)
